title: Invstigate adding clone command
description: Using the ghclone script located at /Users/jimmyers/.bin/ghclone as the example of the commands to follow.
close_reason: Implemented clone command with URL parsing, bare clone + worktree workflow for SSH, and standard clone for HTTPS. Commits: 1e1211f, 7b057e5

title: rig work is creating the correct tmux windows with incorrect names
description: When creating the windows in the tmux session, all windows are getting the title of the session and not the name assigned in the config file.

title: sre timeline command fails with missing zsh-history.db
description:
~/src/thoreinstein/sre   main  2  4  ...........................................................................
  sre timeline fraas-25257
Error: history database not available at: /Users/jimmyers/.histdb/zsh-history.db
Usage:
  sre timeline <ticket> [flags]

Flags:
      --directory string   Filter by directory path
      --failed-only        Show only failed commands (exit code != 0)
  -h, --help               help for timeline
      --limit int          Maximum number of commands to retrieve (default 1000)
      --no-update          Don't update the ticket note, only output to console
      --output string      Output file path (default: update ticket note)
      --since string       Start time (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM or YYYY-MM-DD)
      --until string       End time (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM or YYYY-MM-DD)

Global Flags:
      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.config/sre/config.toml)
  -v, --verbose         verbose output

title: The tests should clean up created tmux sessions when complete
description: The unit tests currently create several new tmux sessions when running locally. They should capture the currently attached session, run the tests, then reattach to the previously attached session, then delete the test sessionns.
close_reason: Implemented TestMain with tmux session cleanup

title: Use environment variable for tmux socket isolation in tests
description:
Track the fix for test sessions leaking onto the main tmux server.

The previous approach (sre-3wc) used socket isolation but only applied it to explicitly created test SessionManagers, not to production code paths called during integration tests.

The fix should ensure environment variable-based socket isolation so all tmux operations during tests use the isolated test socket.
close_reason: Implemented environment variable-based tmux socket isolation. Tests now use SRE_TEST_TMUX_SOCKET env var to run on isolated sre-test socket.

title: clone command is not properly translating https git urls to git
tmux client is not creating any panes but the deault on sre work or sre hack
close_reason: Fixed TMUX env var collision - added viper.SetEnvPrefix('SRE') to prevent tmux's TMUX env var from overwriting config

title: The command  is improperly named
description: Rename the sre init command to be sre work, as in "sre work on ticket <arg>"
close_reason: Renamed 'sre init' command to 'sre work' - commit c61089f

title: Replace ACLI with Direct Jira API v3 Integration
description: Replace the current ACLI CLI tool dependency with direct Jira Cloud REST API v3 calls. This removes the external tool requirement while maintaining read-only functionality. Uses raw net/http (no external Jira library) to minimize dependencies.
